title: Side Profiles and Irises ~Yes, No, or Maybe Half? Spinoff~ - Novel Updates
tags: Character Growth   Co-Workers   Couple Growth   Devoted Love Interests   Love Triangles   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Office Romance   R-18   Showbiz   Tsundere
author: Ichiho Michi
description:
Shin is an assistant director on the popular variety show “Go Go Dash.” He additionally gets placed on a nightly news program produced at the same network and gets to know the sports news anchor, Minagawa Tatsuki. Tatsuki is loud, popular, and has a bold look in his eyes—the type of guy that Shin typically has a hard time getting along with, but for some reason, Shin can’t seem to take his eyes off Tatsuki when he talks, always so vibrant and full of life. Shin has always been happy just working on “GoGo,” the show that he has always loved, with the producer, Sakae, whom he has admired and idolized; however, Tatsuki keeps closing the distance between him and Shin…

Volume 1: Side Profiles and Irises
Volume 2: Love Rivals and Irises
Volume 3: Block It Out

Note: The Side Profiles series features one couple and the Block It series features a second couple. This set of spinoffs takes place after volume 3 of the main series, “Yes, No, or Maybe Half?” It is recommended that you read the main series first, but it is not strictly necessary.>
